title: How to feel if BTS is with me - Quora

response.answer_text: The question is relating to you. No one can know how you feel if BTS is with you but you. Others could only imagine how you feel. It comes across like you're asking yourself a question which only you have the answer for. If your question was How do you feel if BTS is with you? You are making a statement in general so others can contribute to your question. To be honest, this is a question to you from you. So am adking you now. How do you feel if BTS is with you ? Please don't find me rude. Hope you understand what am trying to say too you…………….Peace Out

Okay honest… You'll die on the spot!! You'll cry of enjoyment, your heart will beating so fast as fast as a racing car. Just imagine, only seeing their pictures and videos makes you smile and your heart beat fast and how about meeting them in realife?????? It's like your crush confessing he or she had a same feeling toward youuu 💜
